targets.query: SELECT mean("processing_cycles_pct") FROM "vswitch_dpdk_pmd_metrics" WHERE "core_id" =~ /\d.*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "core_id", "hostname", "numa_id" fill(null)
SELECT last("polling_cycles_pct") FROM "vswitch_dpdk_pmd_metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "core_id", "hostname", "numa_id" fill(null)

panels.title: OVS PMD Avg Cycles Per Packet (Cycles/Packet)

rows.title: OVS PMD Avg Cycles Per Packets (Cycles/Packet)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tx_bytes_rate") AS "TX", mean("rx_bytes_rate") AS "RX" FROM "vswitch_dpdk_interface_metrics" WHERE "instance_name" = 'unknown' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "hostname", "if_name", "instance_name" fill(none)

targets.query: SELECT mean("tx_bytes_rate") AS "TX", mean("rx_bytes_rate") AS "RX" FROM "vswitch_dpdk_interface_metrics" WHERE "libvirt_uuid" <> 'na' AND "libvirt_uuid" =~ /^$LibvirtUuid$/  AND "if_name" =~ /^*$Ifc$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "if_name", "instance_name", "hostname" fill(none)

list.name: Ifc
list.query: show tag values with key="if_name" where host_ip =~ /^$HostIp$/

list.name: Start of Test
list.query: select event_title,event_text,event_tag from stm_events where event_title=~ /^Start.*Test/ and stc_session_token=~ /$SessionId$/

list.name: End of Test
list.query: select event_title,event_text,event_tag from stm_events where event_title=~ /^End.*Test/ and stc_session_token=~ /$SessionId$/

list.name: Start of Traffic
list.query: select event_title,event_text,event_tag from stm_events where event_title=~ /^Start.*Traffic/ and stc_session_token=~ /$SessionId$/

list.name: End of Traffic
list.query: select event_title,event_text,event_tag from stm_events where event_title=~ /^(End|Stop).*Traffic/ and stc_session_token=~ /$SessionId$/

list.name: Automatic Event
list.query: select event_title,event_text,event_tag from stm_events where stc_session_token=~ /$SessionId$/ and event_tag=~ /AutoInfluxEvent/ and event_title!~ /^(Start|End|Stop).*(Test|Traffic)/
